content: - exit TB - copy the mbox to the Mail/Local folders folder - restart TB and the folder and messages should appear
creator: davidsk

content: Thanks, but - my "View" menu doesn't have a "Sort by" option. How many versions are there, do I have something such as a duff automatic update?
creator: ljl153

content: It sounds like it has threading turned on. In the View menu, go to Sort By, and click on Unthreaded. Of course if it's already set that way you may have a different issue...
creator: fred37

content:
I understand no other programs have a problem. Still, it will be helpful to know the results of the following....

  • Please start *Windows* in safe mode with networking enabled https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/12376/windows-10-start-your-pc-in-safe-mode
  • Still in Windows safe mode, start Thunderbird in Troubleshoot mode https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/troubleshoot-mode-thunderbird

Does problem go away?

Also, who is your mail provider?
creator: wsmwk

content: Non mi risultano segnalazioni di questo problema, ma questo non esclude che possa trattarsi di un bug. Hai lo stesso comportamento anche in Modalità risoluzione dei problemi? -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/modalita-risoluzione-problemi-thunderbird
creator: @next

content:
Start Thunderbird in Troubleshoot mode https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/troubleshoot-mode-thunderbird

Does problem go away?
creator: wsmwk

content: V mojom prípade Thunderbird súbory *.eml otvára správne a presne tak isto ako po mnohé roky - teda aj s predmetom. Asi sa bude treba pohrať s nastavením vášho ERP systému. Nemám k dispozícii váš ERP systém, takže nemôžem preveriť. Jedine, že by ste mi poslali nejaký pokusne vygenerovaný *.eml súbor.

content: The other thing is that it is not updating. I see a mail come in on my phone and the inbox doesn't update unless I close TB down and reopen it. This blows.
creator: dsooley

content: Right-click an account in the Folder Pane, Subscribe, and uncheck the unwanted folders. Try also setting some folders as Favourites, then View/Folders/Favourite Folders.
creator: sfhowes

content: Click the icon next to the Quick Filter button and select Table View.
